menu.name: Bruschetta Classica
menu.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and extra virgin olive oil.

menu.name: Antipasto Misto
menu.description: A generous platter featuring the finest Italian cured meats including prosciutto di Parma, salami, and mortadella. Accompanied by aged cheeses, marinated vegetables, Kalamata olives, and served with fresh focaccia bread.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Classic Roman pasta with eggs, pancetta, pecorino cheese, and black pepper.

menu.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
menu.description: Fresh fettuccine pasta in rich cream sauce with parmesan and butter.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

menu.name: Pizza Diavola
menu.description: Spicy salami, mozzarella, tomato sauce, and chili flakes.

menu.name: Osso Buco
menu.description: Braised veal shanks with saffron risotto and gremolata.

menu.name: Branzino al Sale
menu.description: Mediterranean sea bass baked in sea salt with herbs and lemon.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert with mascarpone, coffee, and cocoa.

menu.name: Panna Cotta
menu.description: Silky vanilla custard with berry coulis and fresh berries.
